cause.description:
Bridges To Community is about building - building a broader and deeper sense of community across cultural divides; building a spirit of friendship and solidarity that transcends politics, economics and religion; building buildings with materially poor communities that promise the beginnings of a better future; and in the end, building a community of global citizens who feel deeply connected to the world and who are committed to making it more just.
1. Help fight severe poverty.
2. Allow impoverished persons to live a dignified and proud life.
3. Provide opportunity for those without.
cause.mission: offer help in materially poor places.
cause.name: Bridges To Community
